en: It is a bright, sunny day.
zh: 今天是一个阳光明媚的日子。

en: Peppa and her family are in the park.
They are going to fly a kite!
George is going to fly the kite first.
zh: 乔治要第一个把风筝放起来。

en: George runs as fast as he can.
But the kite won't fly.
zh: 但是风筝就是不能飞起来。

en: George! You're doing it all wrong!
You didn't run fast enough.
Now, it's my turn!
Peppa runs as fast as she can.
But the kite still won't fly.
zh: 但是风筝仍然没有飞起来。

en: The kite won't fly if there isn't any wind,
zh: 如果没有风，风筝是飞不起来的，

en: no matter how fast you run.
Oh!
We'll just have to wait, until the wind picks up a bit.
zh: 我们再等等吧，有点风起来就可以了。

en: Look, it's getting windy!
Now that it is windy, the kite can fly!
zh: 现在起风了，风筝可以飞起来了！

en: The wind is quite strong now.
George! Wahhh!
Peppa!
Thank you, Daddy！
Daddy Pig flies the kite.
Hurray!
Higher, higher!
Daddy pig flies the kite very well.
zh: 猪爸爸的风筝放得很不错。

en: Wow!
Yes, I am a bit of an expert at these things
zh: 没错，在这种事情上我算是专家了。

en: Watch out for the trees!
You might get the kite stuck in one.
zh: 你会把风筝卡在树上的。

en: Don't worry，I know what I'm doing.
zh: 不用担心，我知道我在做什么。

en: Oh, dear. Daddy Pig has got the kite caught in a tree.
zh: 哦，糟糕。猪爸爸把风筝卡在了一棵树上。

en: Oh, no!
Don't worry, George.Daddy will get the kite down.
zh: 不用担心，乔治。爸爸会把风筝拿下来的。

en: Hurray!
Careful! There's a big muddy puddle!
zh: 小心点！那里有一个大泥坑！

en: Peppa and George love to jump in muddy puddles.
zh: 佩奇和乔治喜欢跳进泥坑玩。

en: Can we jump in the puddle?
zh: 我们可以跳进泥坑里吗？

en: Please!
No. I don't want you covered in mud.
zh: 不行。我不想你们浑身都是泥。

en: Ohhhhhhhhh...
Stand back, children.
Please be careful, Daddy Pig!
I know what I'm doing.
Please be careful!
Just a bit further, Daddy!
Daddy Pig, you are much too heavy for that branch!
zh: 猪爸爸，你太重了树枝撑不住了！

en: Nonsense! I know exactly how heavy I am.
zh: 胡说！我知道我自己有多重！

en: There!
Hurray!
Daddy Pig has rescued the kite!
Oh, dear. Everyone is covered in mud.
zh: 哦，糟糕。每个人身上都是泥了。

en: It's only mud.
Luckily, Daddy Pig hasn't hurt himseIf.
And the kite is out of the tree!
zh: 而风筝也从树上拿下来了！

en: Hurray!
Mummy... Now that we are all muddy,
zh: 妈妈。。。现在我们都全身是泥了，

en: can we jump in the puddle?
zh: 我们可以跳进泥坑里玩了吧？

en: I suppose so.
After all, you can't get any muddier...
And I think Daddy Pig is going to be doing the washing...
zh: 但我想猪爸爸得去洗洗才行。。。

en: Peppa and George love jumping up and down in muddy puddles!
zh: 佩奇和乔治喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！

en: Mummy and Daddy love jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
zh: 妈妈和爸爸也喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！

en: Everyone loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles!
zh: 大家都喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！

en: Jumping up and down in muddy puddles is just as much fun as flying the kite!
zh: 在泥坑里跳来跳去就和放风筝一样有趣！
